body:
#ETMweb - Employee Time Management - web application using ETM library

By Leont Bielski

#LaborTM - website using this application
Labor Time Management is a web service for employers that tracks time employees spend on their tasks by providing easy to use time tracking interface.
Who is it for?

Organizations where job pays are hourly based such as hotels, restaurants, stores.
Key features

    Employees log in and log off through simple web interface with personal codes
    Each employee can have multiple jobs assigned to him
    Overtimes are calculated with ability to adjust to organization overtime policy 

##Changes

v1.0 2012-08-18 Leonty Belskiy

* Initial release
